website_summaries.verdict: The Fire TV combines 4K video support and Amazon's Alexa voice assistant to make the already-excellent $100 media streamer even more powerful.
pros: Improved voice search with Alexa voice assistant
cons: Occasionally stutters when jumping between apps
Content is heavily weighted toward Amazon sources

customer_reviews.title: Already owned a fire stick and bought this for another ...
customer_reviews.text: Already owned a fire stick and bought this for another TV. I've got to say it's well worth spending the extra, it runs so much more smoothly and less laggy than the stick.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Yeah
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says on the tin. 4 stars because amazon didn't see fit to include hdmi cable in the box. At £80 I think it should be included.
customer_reviews.author: Rabbat

customer_reviews.title: Good but limiting
customer_reviews.text: If you have read any of my other reviews you will see that I now have an nVidia Shield instead of this. I bought this originally to be my main media HUB, and it did this job well. Streaming quality was fantastic, but I didn't like the fact that the store was limited and being Amazon's skin over Android, it wasn't stock and so certain things were not possible or as easy as they otherwise could be. That aside, as a streaming and media device it was very good, and I ended up giving it away to a good friend who was extremely appreciative, and to this day still uses it for her media consumption.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Will no longer connect to internet & UNABLE to contact AMAZON for help!
customer_reviews.text: I currently have frustrated kids that are unable to watch content that I have purchased, and now refuse to buy on other platform (sky) The device will not connect to internet and has been unable to for over a week now and unbale to connect to an advisor. £80 for a year. No support after. Not a good service for an Amazon prime (for years) member!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie ryder

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Another really bad product from Amazon. This is really not worth buying as it will break down on you in the end. Mine lasted just over a year. Try and avoid amazon products if you can, unfortunately most of us want to watch our prime on the, so we have to buy thier bad products. To top it off the box now no longer exists and you be conned into buying extras with the new one. I feel robbed from Amazon. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: nik park

customer_reviews.title: This is bad.
customer_reviews.text: This remote! Will always disconnect randomly! Have tried multiple units and remotes! This is just really bad! Also wifi is does not work with BT Smart hub on wifi. Ethernet only. All in all! Avoid!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Rhys Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Great device for the family the only flaw being the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great device for the family the only flaw being the fact that google keep trying to take services away from them and that this device cant handle anymore than fat 32 so 4gb file sizes only meaning if you want to load a film via usb onto the device to watch something it wont play it unless you use mkv splitter or similar software allowing you to split a video file into multiple parts.
customer_reviews.author: Tb

customer_reviews.title: Dodgy business practices
customer_reviews.text: Surprised and disappointed that this was sold to me when a newer one was launched only days later. Clearly, had I known of the newer model I would have delayed purchase for a few days. IMHO this is not only unfair but also unethical. Please provide me with the newer model.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Allen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent device
customer_reviews.text: Following 2 defective items the present fire TV works well. I previously owned a fire TV and this iteration is noticeably quicker and the picture quality is stunning. I have used a number of programmes and apps all of them work very well indeed. Can I recommend this product? Definitely, it is easy to set up and operate, a real joy once the two previous versions were replaced.
customer_reviews.author: the golfer

customer_reviews.title: 2 years and dead!
customer_reviews.text: Often difficult to navigate and not all that easy to use. Having bought numerous films the thing has now completely stopped after 2 years and none of the "fixes" has any effect, the thing is virtually dead. This is longer than many users report but at £80.00 I really think it should last longer, what happens to all my purchased films now and how on earth does anyone get help from Amazon? Poor.
customer_reviews.author: William B.

customer_reviews.title: Very good product. Especially strong with U
customer_reviews.text: Very good product.Especially strong with U.K centric apps.Easy sideloading,in fact it's a doddle.Much like Roku this has been the box to hand for a lot of people.Although it's 4k capable the coming replacement for this unit is most welcome.The new unit is touted as having hdr & 60fps support for 4k/uhd plus a full version 2 hdmi port unlike this version's 1.4 hdmi port.I think the fact that in just over two years the price on this product has remained steady at around £79.99 tells you all you need to know.Still a very worthy contender for those that don't have 4k/uhd hdr.For those that do have hdr support it's worth waiting a little while for the new model to drop.
customer_reviews.author: R.Mash

customer_reviews.title: my Fire TV Stick is far better. At least I can trust it to work ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing performance. Firstly, the voice remote failed intermittently with the Amazon Basics batteries that came with it. I had to replace with non-Amazon batteries. Secondly, the Fire TV crashes at least once every time I use it, just hangs on a blank screen until I switch off the power. So far, my Fire TV Stick is far better. At least I can trust it to work consistently.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and used wirelessly or wired, I cannot fault it. It might have been better if it had a small keyboard but that's just a minor inconvenience. I now have access to various apps, tv shows etc which takes away my reliance on SKY. Very easy to instal KODI on yourself as well if that's what you are interested in. Obviously you don't get the full benefits unless you are a Prime member, but even without that, you still are able to use a load of great features.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad who was always complained about the lack of sport and things, although there wasn't much in the way of sport, so this ended up in my mums room where she is using iplayer and itv player on catchup. Shes thrilled with it and it keeps her occupied! Can take a little while to start up and load everything, but it does the job well.
customer_reviews.author: PC Gaming Fan

customer_reviews.title: I upgraded from the Fire TV stick which was brilliant in the first place
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from the Fire TV stick which was brilliant in the first place. If you value smoothness, speed, the abillity to increase memory(micro sd card), 4k viewing, and a usb slot then the Fire TV box is well worth the extra money. Like the Fire TV stick the box can be set up out of sight and the remote will still work fine and you also have a voice search. Ive owned a few streaming devices in the past, the Amazon Fire TV box is by far the best and it doesn't break the bank to own one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great product!
customer_reviews.text: A surprisingly small but solid feel the device is easy to set up. Just plug the HDMI, Ethernet (WiFi is alternate) & power, switch on the TV & select the relevant HDMI service & the Amazon TV will bootup. First boot on my setup took about 30mins. The Box proceeds to call down a load of new software. Once this is complete the TV works flawlessly, takes no time to startup and operation is much smoother than the Amazon app on my Sony Bluray player. Overall a great product which substantially expands the range of available viewing material. Amazon need however to work on providing a greater selection of factual programme material.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Fire TV
customer_reviews.text: I have had the amazon firestick for a couple of years, it works great sometimes a little slow but all in all good. After listening to a couple of friends who had the fire TV I thought why not try one and its been one of the best purchases, easy to install and set up and great quality. I have BT broadband on Infinity 2 and it flies. No lagging great quality pictures, and simple to load Kodi on. Great buy Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: B. J. Middleton

customer_reviews.title: Amazing piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing piece of kit, can't believe I waited so long before buying one... I used to have my laptop plugged into my TV to stream stuff like Netflix, BBC iPlayer, ITV hub etc but this is a million times better and HD picture quality is amazing.. I don't even need a TV aerial any more because it's got live TV too.... up to now I can't fault it.... Jury is still out on whether I prefer prime TV over Netflix, I'll probably keep both as having both is still cheaper than sky or virgin media packages
customer_reviews.author: pauld

customer_reviews.title: Great technically but don't get too attached to Tv series
customer_reviews.text: The box was very easy to set up and providing wifi is working fine everything works very well. The one annoying thing is, when you watch a TV series which is free, it may become "not free" over night. It happened to me 4 times which is annoying and it would be nice if there was a date of when the series is free until... but I guess this is how they want to make money. But there is no way I would pay £2.50 per episode. However, there is a good selection of movies and Tv shows on there.
customer_reviews.author: K Links

customer_reviews.title: hdcp 2.2 ruins everything.
customer_reviews.text: It's unfortunate about the pointless hdcp 2.2 content protection. I have a 4K TV from Amazon that I can't watch my 4K Amazon Prime on! Absolute nightmare finding out if it will work with your TV. I really would like the voice remote to work as a voice search on any text box, not just limited to the Amazon content. If Amazon has the technology for Alexa then surely the Fire TV voice search can search by voice in any text box? I don't ever use the voice function as I mostly search on apps. Overall the interface is good, it's quick to start up and I've had no performance issues or crashes.
customer_reviews.author: Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent piece of kit.
customer_reviews.text: As a subscriber to Amazon Video and Netflix, I didn't realise how the interfaces to these varied until I decided to buy the Amazon Fire TV. I have been getting into Netflix through my Virgin Tivo box. Loading Netflix took an age, although streaming was fine once it had loaded. Virgin doesn't support Amazon Video, so I had to use the app on my smart TV to use this. This was very clunky and searching for films was a slow and laborious process. Both work superbly on the Fire TV. Its worth the money just for that, so accessing music and photos along with all of the other extras is a bonus. I would thoroughly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful visual quality, great array of viewing options. Perfect addition to every home media setup!
customer_reviews.text: Moving from an older network media player device with a pretty dull visual interface and SD output to a full HD device makes for a pretty good viewing experience anyway, but the clean interface and integrated apps make this a brilliant piece of technology. Definitely worth adding the Plex app and hooking up a plex media server to the mix. So far (two or three weeks of using the Fire TV) I have found the system to be stable, powerful, flexible and it constantly delivers flawless quality.
customer_reviews.author: Andi Ramsay

customer_reviews.title: Totally Recommend the Fire TV Box (don't bother with the Stick)
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with our new Fire TV box after first purchasing the Fire Stick which is a complete waste of money. Everything loads fast and looks pin sharp in HD. Playback on BBC iPlayer, ITV Player (Hub), Eurosport Player, Netflix, YouTube and so on all works perfectly. Highly recommend this and don't bother with the Stick.
customer_reviews.author: Wozzza

customer_reviews.title: The Future for TV
customer_reviews.text: Very good replacement for my Virgin films package. Easy to set up and operates faultlessly. No problems at all and the voice search feature is very clever. I pay for a yearly subscription with Amazon which works out at just over a £1 per week for additional movies and music. Excellent package.
customer_reviews.author: P. Holley

customer_reviews.title: Useful for primer delivery
customer_reviews.text: We don't use it as much as we thought but it's ok. We really only bought it to watch the new grand tor rogramme wich was ok. The main use for us is actually the amazon prime delivery service.
customer_reviews.author: Salina

customer_reviews.title: Great gizmo!
customer_reviews.text: Actual item is exactly what it says on the box. I bought a half metre HDMI cable to go from box to tv, and all Amazon has to do now is deliver the programmes! I haven't worked out how to view my photos yet. Loved the voice recognition on the control, makes it easier to find something when you can't remember the title, no endless trawling through searching
customer_reviews.author: Lindseyb

customer_reviews.title: The remote constantly drops connection (not a battery issue), ...
customer_reviews.text: The remote constantly drops connection (not a battery issue), which means you have to unplug the entire Fire TV every time you want to turn it on because the supplied remote won't turn the box on (holding play and the select button as Amazon recommends is no help). The box also struggles to find a wifi connection, despite there being no problems on that end or with connecting other devices to wifi - requiring you to turn it off and on again in order to find the connection. Turning it off and on probably wouldn't be necessary, but without wifi the Fire TV doesn't recognise the remote or the Amazon remote app on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Marshal B.

customer_reviews.title: Best Generation Fire TV!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a Roku 3 device as they stopped supporting Spotify or didn't bother to update the app. The Amazon Fire TV is amazing!!! It hasn't crashed yet and I use it for Prime TV, Netflix, Spotify and youtube. It can do a lot more but I am still learning new things on it everyday! I will install these on all my projects!!
customer_reviews.author: Interloom

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good but still some annoying cons
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, smooth to use. Picture quality seems good on the whole though still not found much 4k content I want to try so can't speak to that. Generally some good content on Prime. Remote is nice to use. Wireless connection can be occasionally temperamental and it disconnects for no reason. Menu animations are smooth but sometimes take too long so don't feel fast. Needs a NOW TV app for other content- without this I'm tempted to get the new 4k NOW TV box when it comes out later this year.
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: Probably does more than I know!
customer_reviews.text: Loving it. Given as a present and still not sure what else it can do. Love the music and the playlists and the fact you can download to your mobile for no charge. Films and TV has a lot of choice but not sure what some of them are as never watched. Would love it if it could replace my TV provider and save money but I'm not sure if it can yet. If amazon did superfast broadband too it would be a no brainer!
customer_reviews.author: Sue W

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Amazon Fire TV Box
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised at the quality,weight and how well packaged the unit was. After setting up I was very pleased with how easy the menus are to scroll through. After using the unit I was very happy with the content available to me and the picture quality is excellent. I recommend plugging in via Ethernet if you can as it adds to the already fast operating speeds.The wifi connection is also great and convenient. I have shared my good reviews with friends who are also purchasing one. I reccomend Amazon Prime as the content available is huge.
customer_reviews.author: hadyn stokes

customer_reviews.title: Great device (but voice recognition needs work)
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my dad and he really enjoys it: easy to set up and use all the usual apps (Netflix, Amazon Prime etc.) as well as some live television. Not sure I would use it for gaming but then again I haven't tried that yet! Might be more orinted towards children that way. Five stars overall, but voice recognition would be an issue if I ever needed to use it as it rarely gets it right and is no more convenient than typing it.
customer_reviews.author: Maxim

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product which is let down by only supporting certain ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product which is let down by only supporting certain TV's. This means that although you may have a 4K TV unless your tv is on Amazons list you won't be able to stream in 4K only 1080p. There is also an issue with dropout on sound either through the amazon app or Fire tv and stick. Amazon are trying to sort this problem out.
customer_reviews.author: barados

customer_reviews.title: Neat and very easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: The box is pleasantly tiny and occupies little space in amongst all the other TV appendages. Set up is simplicity itself. The box looked for and found my router and then connected effortlessly. My only reserve is not to do with the box itself, but the service that is provides. Amazon TV is fairly new and has a lot of work to do before we can all disconnect our satellite dishes. But it will come. (but yes, I bought it because I watched the first episode of Top Gear and decided to not watch any more)
customer_reviews.author: Dave FromKent

customer_reviews.title: Taken a nose dive lately
customer_reviews.text: Last few updates have taken this from a 4/5 to a 2/5 product, for me... Its now really tricky to find things due to the change of UI - discoverability has taken a nose dive - and I am having a LOT of problems with audio being out of sync on both Netflix and Amazon Video. Another problem, although quite rare really, is if you have no internet connection (due to your provider being down for example!), then NOTHING will work - not even apps you have installed locally. NOTHING.... Needs to be always on.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: On the plus side it was easy to install and the picture quality is impressive but ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the 4k HD addition, however I did not realise that the movies were chargeable at around £20 a go!! Also Amazon charge for films that are old which you can watch for free on normal TV. Why is this?? On the plus side it was easy to install and the picture quality is impressive but an ordinary fire stick would probably have served the purpose!
customer_reviews.author: boleyn

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: The box is tiny! Easiest installation I've ever completed. Easy to use. Easy to navigate. Picture quality is great. The speed is awesome and, so far, zero buffering. I haven't had time to use all the facilities but, as a TV watching experience, I can't fault this little box. My only gripe is there's no HDMI cable and the product description doesn't warn you either, so had to go and buy a cable. Not a biggie but would have been nice if Amazon made this clear so I could have ordered it at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: A. Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Fire Tv does Alexa!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this months ago, and with the software update the fire TV box now also has Alexa built in, this is great, with on screen results for weather, shopping list, etc, and of course full integration with other Alexa compatible devices, lights etc. Really pleased that amazon rolled out the software update to this device aswell as the fire stick!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Andrew L. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant for home and away
customer_reviews.text: Moved from a fire tv stick to this. Such a massive difference. I have found no lagging or slow down like on the stick with some more tricky tasks. Managed to get showbox loaded in and that works perfectly smoothly. No issues. And I think it looks nicer than the newer version. Plus after watching some YouTube reviews the older version is actually faster than the newer version.
customer_reviews.author: Mikeraynor123

customer_reviews.title: No audio port - I prefer the original!
customer_reviews.text: It's well worth getting if you have an Amazon Prime subscription. The free music library is excellent but the one downside is that the new generation Fire TV doesn't have an audio outlet to connect to an amplifier. From Amazon info: 'The optical audio port can be used to connect to a stereo system. Not available on Amazon Fire TV (2nd Generation).' The 1st Gen Fire TV did connect to a sound system and for me that is a negative change. Also, the original Fire TV's controller was better made.
customer_reviews.author: Ned

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little black box
customer_reviews.text: This little black box is amazing, I wish I had got one years ago! I no longer pay huge Sky bills, you can add so many different apps to adapt the box to what you want it to do for you. It takes a little bit of time to get used to how to use it & where everything is but once you've grasped it it's fantastic, it's not difficult to use having said that either. If you decide to buy this you won't be disappointed. Enjoy!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Lisle

customer_reviews.title: absolutely love it. If you have prime
customer_reviews.text: Got this on sale for 65, absolutely love it. If you have prime, it just works great for tv and movies. We use it loads. Also great for catch up, bbc, itv, C4, C5, UK TV play and youtube all on the big tv. Love the voice remote.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin

customer_reviews.title: Having purchased a Panasonic smart tv, and getting Netflix I found that my ...
customer_reviews.text: Having purchased a Panasonic smart tv, and getting Netflix I found that my set was not that smart 😩 in fact struggled to load anything, dilemma change the set or stop trying to load programs, after a visit to curry's having looked at Fire to unit on line, there it was my answer the Fire TV from Amazon same price as online, it took 20 minutes to drive home plug it in and watch a film from Netflix 👍 what a piece of kit, then find out that there is a remote app for my iPhone 6 plus so no remote 😀 one happy bunny x
customer_reviews.author: lizi ninnim

customer_reviews.title: Initially I was a little disappointed that there didn't appear to be very much that ...
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was a little disappointed that there didn't appear to be very much that I didn't have to pay extra for, however, at least most of the series are included within the original price. I will keep searching though to find more things to watch. Can't comment on games and other things like that as I don't use them
customer_reviews.author: Mrs A Easton

customer_reviews.title: A warning to people and I want my money back amazon!
customer_reviews.text: My house nearly burnt down today. The box melted through my plastic desk and landed on a bunch of wires, I burnt my hands trying to pick it up. It was red hot If I'd been 15 minutes later the Amazon Fire Box would have successfully burnt my house down. Do not buy any Amazon product as they are unreliable and cheap. And from a guy who normally relies on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: DjSteveyG

customer_reviews.title: Great, but freezes from time to time...
customer_reviews.text: The streaming works fine, although we have not yet acquired a 4k tv and tested it on full bandwidth. The remote is easy to use, but often becomes unresponsive for a minute or so, with the white light on the box not responding. We thought this was a fault, but the replacement unit has the same issue. Hopefully, a software update will fix it. With a bit of patience, I was still able to enjoy the 3 first instalments of the Grand Tour!
customer_reviews.author: Mature User

customer_reviews.title: Happy chappie with new Fire TV Box :-¦)
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed using the first Fire TV box, which we have had for some time, but this new box is even better with the Ultra HD. The streaming is seamless and I have yet to experience any delay. There was no problem setting it up, I just had to remember my code and it started immediately. I have read some reviews where the writer reckons they couldn't access the programmes. They must have a very old TV or, perhaps no aerial ;-) I have both boxes working now in different rooms and have found no incompatibility.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Locke

customer_reviews.title: Pretty easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: When my old WDTV box was getting a bit long in the tooth, I looked round for a suitable replacement. This ticked all the boxes for me as it's future-proofed for 4K and can run apps such as YouTube, BBC iPlayer, Kodi and VLC. So that covers most of my viewing methods be they streaming or from my NAS. Pretty easy to set up and use, I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Shardlow

customer_reviews.title: Kindle fire box
customer_reviews.text: The new fire is fast unit with all you need to stream your prime movie's & tv with ease . Prebuffering assists in a smooth experience watching HD films. The ethernet connection socket is great. It's a pity there is no qwerty keyboard as this would make life very easy & it's about time amazon & google stopped playing silly games concerning the apps you can run, I still have to run a ROKU box to watch NOW TV as Fire does not support it & I had to get a Kindle to watch Prime movies as my google tablet did not support it. Gentlemen sort it out !
customer_reviews.author: graco

customer_reviews.title: Picture is good on HD and on UHD is excellent
customer_reviews.text: Plugged in and fired up without drama. Picture is good on HD and on UHD is excellent. Easy to use - shame there is no audio optical out for those of us who prefer to process audio separately. The remote is not infra-red so if you are integrating it into your HT system and want to use a 'universal' remote you may want to purchase a Flirc USB IR dongle. (you wont be able to access the voice activated commands in this case)
customer_reviews.author: TWood

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little box
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little box. I have prime and every time I wanted to watch something I had connect my computer up to my tv I know it wasent hard but it took abit of time to sort.but with this I took it out of the box and it was up and going within two mins ,quick and easy the only thing that I did notice that if you don't use the remote for a period of time ie for a day or so you have to take the batteries out and put them back in and this seems to sort the problem.
customer_reviews.author: MR KEVIN E JONES

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my husbands birthday in June and we haven't ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husbands birthday in June and we haven't had a peep out of him since. He's finished all the Vikings episodes, then went on to Outlanders and now onto another series with people in wigs. Maybe he'll surface again soon so I can ask him what he thinks of his new toy ,but as far as the rest of us are concerned it's five star peace and quiet !
customer_reviews.author: Smooth and Shiny

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Why on earth can I not get Amazon underground apps on fire TV. I can download a game for free on my tablet but am expected to pay for the same game on this....WHY. Also had to side load a browser as this thing doesn't have one. In fact this thing throws up constant obstacles to stop you from Installing apps that are not affiliated with Amazon and this can be very frustrating. But even Amazon's own apps (Amazon underground) are not supported. I think I will cut my losses and go back to a Android box.
customer_reviews.author: I.alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great for streaming media
customer_reviews.text: I have an older fire stick which I upgraded with the fire tv box. The jump in performance was immediate. Check that you can get all the services that you want or need. If you are wedded to Sky you will almost certainly have to get that in some other way. But otherwise, for a wide range of services, and especially for those with Amazon Prime accounts, this is a great device.
customer_reviews.author: James Macfarlane

customer_reviews.title: Best android box i've used
customer_reviews.text: Had box a week now, excellent piece of kit. I've had fire stick previous and an Android box, but fire TV is an improvement. Runs very fast, excellent response form remote. Maybe a little dearer than some Android box in market but I assure you this is worth the extra few pound, especially as you are buying from Amazon which gives piece of mind also. Add your Amazon prime account and box goes to another level again. Can't recommend enough.
customer_reviews.author: kevinC

customer_reviews.title: It's fantastic for everything except stable 4k steaming
customer_reviews.text: It's fantastic for everything except stable 4k steaming. On reading the numerous reviews I'm not alone either & I've made sure I've not left any stone unturned in using it correctly. 200Mbs + broadband, very short 0.5m HDMI 4k compliant cable & still 4k only works some of the time. Please get this sorted Amazon as £70+ is not cheap when the product doesn't work properly.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Carless

customer_reviews.title: All-New Amazon Fire TV with 4K Ultra HD ...It's Fire TV alright! woken up mine!!
customer_reviews.text: All-New Amazon Fire TV with 4K Ultra HD ... What a blessing this has been! I have a smart LG TV that struggled with YouTube, BBCi player and especially ITV Player. Through my new "All-New Amazon Fire TV with 4K Ultra HD" I don't experience the ever so frustrating & annoying streaming problems. So good bye to my "spinning washing machine drum" I think this is a brilliant product. What a picture quality !! I highly recommend this product. Well done Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Maxie

customer_reviews.title: It keeps me company in the weekends
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the Amazon Fire TV as I can watch movies and shows. Good quality and efficiency. The only drawback is that it's internal memory is tiny and the apps do not use the additional external memory so it fulls up very quickly if you want to install all these nice things and games.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Great Unit Rec.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely recommend this unit. For anyone like myself who is not the greatest in understanding these gadgets, it was so easy.From box to installing and operational about 6-7mins. I have been using the unit every day for over week now without any operational problems. The picture and sound quality are really excellent. Just remember that you will need to supply an decent quality HDMI lead as this is not included in the basic package.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fire TV streaming box (4K)
customer_reviews.text: Excellent addition to home entertainment system. Simple remote to operate and easy to navigate around the menus. Used in a room that only had WiFi signal and operates flawlessly without any buffering. Provides access to many streaming apps, Amazon Prime, Netflix, BBC Iplayer, YouTube, Box office, Sky etc. Great 4K reception as content rolls out. If near enough to hub can be "hard wired"
customer_reviews.author: Claretcass

customer_reviews.title: Make your TV smart again.
customer_reviews.text: Again another fine product from Amazon. This neat little box makes watching TV with Prime so easy, without prime you do have a number of other options, I like to use Plex to stream my own media content. We purchased this because our smart Samsung TV is not so smart anymore, most TV manufacturers will not update the smart software on their TV's after few years to encourage you to buy another TV set. So don't worry about buying a new TV just get a smart little box like this one.
customer_reviews.author: Handbook0

customer_reviews.title: I know that we could have just used the smart features on our TVs but there's something we love ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Fire box we bought. I know that we could have just used the smart features on our TVs but there's something we love about the fire box the interface is very user friendly we have two Samsung bought for their pictures quality not there smart features the only thing that the Samsung has over the Fire box is there is an Internet explorer. Plus it has the advantage over the stick being 4K ultra and can be hard connected to our network so we don't get any wifi dropout
customer_reviews.author: Bigh

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to use, great quality streaming and loads of choice of videos. The only annoying thing is not all videos are included on prime, and it's not obvious how long a certain series/film well be included. I was half way through watching a series when it came off of prime, and it's £2.49 per episode or £11.99 for one series, cheaper to buy it on DVD. But the box itself is great, works really well with no buffering ever.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Button

customer_reviews.title: Almost awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Nice machine, easy to set up. The video and audio quality is also nice. I've found that with 3rd-party apps such as PLEX surround sound doesn't work, you're stuck with stereo which is a shame as the ATV doesn't have that problem, it's frustrating as otherwise it's a much better machine than that. Perhaps it'll be resolved in a future update, fingers crossed. If that doesn't matter to you though then it's a really excellent machine.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Matthew Stringer

customer_reviews.title: not impressed
customer_reviews.text: easy to set up and start using straight away ( make sure you got the hdmi cable) within around 2 weeks cant use constant buffering really really annoying i regret getting this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Greater viewing.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent addition to tv enjoyment but silly not to include the necessary cable. Had my grandson not pointed this out we would not have realized that we needed to order it separately. However, it works very well and it is great to have the Alexa style instruction factor. The general picture quality is very much better.
customer_reviews.author: Gembook

customer_reviews.title: Plug in and play straight away east to use linked to your Amazon Account straight away also very easy to soft wifi out on it
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in the stated time, it's a shame it doesn't come with an HDMI cable so had to purchase one separately. Plug in and play straight away east to use linked to your Amazon Account straight away also very easy to soft wifi out on it. The box is small and neat 4/5 inch square the remote not as big as other remotes ideal. I'm enjoying my Grand Tour catch up
customer_reviews.author: Aceinm

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product - very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Works really well, with no streaming problems or buffering. Our broadband is a fairly poor 6mb at best but the Fire TV seems to have no problems with it. The voice search is superb, so much better than typing the name in. The only negative is that the (included) Amazon batteries for the handset lasted about two weeks. They've been replaced with good ones now, so hopefully they'll last longer!
customer_reviews.author: SiennaSea

customer_reviews.title: Great product, good upgrade if you need 4K or a faster box than the original, just works. Well done Amazon and the engineers.
customer_reviews.text: Great Amazon product. I have several of these and they work great for me. They are speedy and the wireless remote is great. I use amazon prime a lot and I have Kodi installed on it only for my music and pictures stored on my Microsoft server, this could also be a NAS box too. I really recommend this product. I am so impressed, I am buying more shortly to have one in each room.
customer_reviews.author: MR L M ROBINSON

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of equipment. Lovely interface. Though I do wish the same apps were available for each region. I have Amazon UK membership, so I can't access Google Play or Hulu, which is a pity. Also, it'd be lovely if Amazon UK Prime members could access their library whilst travelling. The moment you're out of the UK, geographic restrictions means you can't watch Prime movies and tv. That is stupid since I can only access them as a UK member. Why punish me for travelling!
customer_reviews.author: S. Malik

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says.
customer_reviews.text: Started off with Chromecast. Returned it to Amazon, didn’t work. Bought Fire TV (from J. Lewis, 2 years garantee). Worked out of the box, reasonably easy to st up. Use mainly for YouTube and catchup on UK TV channels. I use with ethernet cable. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth B.

customer_reviews.title: Hardware is good. Amazon not so much!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great box, the hardware is good, it has iPlayer, Netflix, Amazon Prime, but no real network Media Player!!! Kodi has been taken form the Amazon store, and without a decent similar piece of software this is only good as a streaming box, playing from your network is not easy. Apparently it was removed because Kodi promotes Piracy !!???? But if thats the real reason why are Amazon still selling Kodi boxes!!!! Great hardware crippled by ridiculous Amazon policies!
customer_reviews.author: N. R. Gower

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Fire TV with 4K Ultra HD
customer_reviews.text: This replaced my original Fire TV and is a marked improvement right across the board. It appears faster and renders content quickly and has so far eliminated the buffering I used to have. So it is an excellent choice for Amazon Prime members and I urge anyone who may be interested to dive in and try it. 5 big gold ones. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Williamappleseed

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant versatility and content
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant versatility for films, programmes, BBC, ALL 4, and other stations. Free prime films are great, as are the Amazon produced series.Amazon music excellent and easy access to Spotify. Prime photos really good giving access to albums via TV. The remote voice controlled search is brilliant. Why do I still subscribe to exorbitantly priced SKY???
customer_reviews.author: Nick B

customer_reviews.title: wish I could download prime video
customer_reviews.text: It's a great piece of kit. My only disappointment is that, unlike watching amazon prime on my iPad, the Fire TV doesn't give me the option to download episodes. We live in a poor broadband area so streaming can sometimes be a challenge. If I could download - even for a 30 day period - then this would be 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Dump Sky and Get Fire TV
customer_reviews.text: I've just dumped Sky as it got way too expensive and bombarded the viewer with more and more advert. Having bought the Amazon Fire TV I don't miss Sky at all. I have subscribed to Amazon Prime and side-loaded Kodi. There's plenty to watch. It would be nice if the volume could be controlled by the Fire remote.
customer_reviews.author: R4RJB

customer_reviews.title: Much better than the usual Shirts, Socks and Ties!
customer_reviews.text: A surprise gift, this nice modern piece of equipment is easy to set-up BUT I am afraid it didn't manage to find my direct Powerline connection to the router and ended up just connecting by Wi-Fi. However in fairness, so far I haven't suffered any buffering and having now joined Prime there seems to be a reasonable amount of interesting things to watch.
customer_reviews.author: Les London

customer_reviews.title: After 18 months, I am continuously getting "Home unavailable" ...
customer_reviews.text: After 18 months, I am continuously getting "Home unavailable" message and unable to watch any programs. Tried many things including factory reset. Problem keep happening again.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Good for a wired  connection if wi-fi not so good
customer_reviews.text: A great alternative to the firestick if you are needing to use an ethernet connection rather than wi-fi. It is quite a bit pricier than the firestick and considering that the only reason I bought it was because of the ethernet, some of the other features I have no use for. To enjoy the other features such as 4k i think you have to have some pretty fancy equipment to play it on!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overkill unless you need it for 4K
customer_reviews.text: Love the content and features but don't like the always on status of this device. Voice control works just for Amazon video and not for Netflix for instance. Crashed occasionally and the only way to reset is to pull the power out. Small and very great though. Buy it if you need 4K content. Otherwise the Fire TV stick is fine.
customer_reviews.author: HJ

customer_reviews.title: 4k Fire TV
customer_reviews.text: It is actually quite good. I haven't been able to test out the 4k resolution due to not having a 4k tv, but the device is quite responsive. I have reservations about the remote controller as it is quite slippery in hand. The previous controller was soft and easy to hold. Overall, it's a good all rounder and is fit for purpose. You are not limited to using Amazon video, as you can use Netflix and other streaming apps which are supported on this device.
customer_reviews.author: Inspector Gadget

customer_reviews.title: Will get even better
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up 15 minuits, and easy to use, not a great deal of content at the moment, but that will increase over time. I was surprised at the amount of movies you have to pay for even with prime, what I do love though are the tv shows and films in 4k, I'm sure it will be 5 stars soon.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Buy this over the stick.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent - I have 3 fire tv sticks and this is much better overall. Boot time is minimal and launches straight into all apps that I have installed. Unlike the fire tv stick which can be quite slow to boot and open apps / start playing content. Interface is a little different but much nicer - worth the extra cost!
customer_reviews.author: Paddy McHugh

customer_reviews.title: A gadget that actually works
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent little machine Probably the easiest and quickest gadget to set up. Seamless streaming of all available media Easy to navigate screens&menus Simple and responsive remote control with excellent simple voice control command. This was a birthday present around Christmas time and so far I can't fault it It's great.
customer_reviews.author: Retrospekt

customer_reviews.title: Works better than fire TV stick
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Worth the extra over the Fire TV stick. I use it with mains ethernet adapter, which works much better than relying on wifi with the Fire TV stick. Only drawback is that voice control (recognition is excellent) only works for films, not youTube, or Amazon music.
customer_reviews.author: A. Collins

customer_reviews.title: It has developed a fault
customer_reviews.text: This item performed well and we enjoyed some the Amazon TV programmes. Unfortunately the item has now developed a fault and we need a replacement. I suppose 4.5 years is not a bad life for a electronic device but my TV and desk top computer have lasted longer. I was going to order a replacement but I find it is out of stock.
customer_reviews.author: R. Walker

customer_reviews.title: It works for months then inexplicably stops.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned my box for over a year. Initially I had problems where the initial screen froze but then worked without incident for months. However it has gone back to freezing again and nothing seems to work. The only way I can view anything at the moment is to get something on Netflix or YouTube on my iPad and cast it onto the TV; for some reason this won't work for Amazon. Frustrating. I have tried disconnecting and rebooting but this doesn't work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Tv v Amazon Stick
customer_reviews.text: I already have the Amazon fire stick which is now in our bedroom and have upgraded in the living room to the fire tv box this is much faster than the stick i have made it future proof by adding a 128gb memory card as alk the downloaded apps can be moved to the sd card by using the settings menu. As both the stick and the Tv box are on the same account i have the same apps on both automatically sinc via amazon. It is possible to send an app from the firestick to the tv box via the wifi network.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Smith

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate, just get it!
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality and streaming quality of this Fire TV box is amazing. It is all I use nowadays, we have actually cancelled our tv subscription because Amazon Fire TV is all we need. We are Prime members anyway, so it doesn't cost us any extra, and we can even use apps or prime music through our TV now. I definitely do not regret getting this amazing little gadget. The only issue we have found, is that our remote seems to eat batteries... but what can you expect nowadays, right?
customer_reviews.author: Annelien

customer_reviews.title: Superb product
customer_reviews.text: Love it, perfect quality no buffering and a tons of shows and films. I use it constantly and it's never been turned off and I've not had a single fault with it. My only gripe is that Amazon Prime doesn't get family guy or american dad, but that has nothing to do with the actual product which is as close to perfection as you can get for a streaming box.
customer_reviews.author: Russian Eagle

customer_reviews.title: 2nd AFTV box
customer_reviews.text: This is my second fire tv box, i have a 1st gen and now the 4k version and am very happy with both as they have a fast interface and have pretty much all the apps you need for a average user. My only dissappoint/concern was that the remote batteries seem to have already run out of juice less then a month having it and not a high user, it maybe a one off with my order. But overall very happy.
customer_reviews.author: v veeramany

customer_reviews.title: Great for watching Prime TV
customer_reviews.text: Great for watching Prime TV, Netflix, IPlayer etc. Our smart TV's interface leaves a lot to be desired and this is light years ahead. I thought voice search would be little more than a gimmick but it's very accurate. I've connected a games controller and it works well, although playing crossy road with the remote was good fun!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: More blooming channels
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be better to use than apple tv - navigation is OK, but there needs to be an obvious way of setting it so that you only get free content showing in searches - most movies listed are either to pay for or not yet available. i wouldn't subscribe to Prime if it were not for the free postage !
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Well I'm impressed. What a great addition to my streaming set up. It was an easy hassle free set up, the goodies were well packed but easy to unpack and after using....well I thought it was excellent. The voice search was easy and it clearly picked up and displayed everything I asked which is more than I can say for Apple, with my kiwi accent. The films loaded up very quickly and without a moments lag or juddering. Overall I'm very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Sigh

customer_reviews.title: Great TV / Sreaming box
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with this, great responsiveness moving between menus and apps, all very quick. Plex setup very easy so can now access content stored on a PC. Couple of things I don't like 1) ads on the home screen, videos and banner type ads, I subscribe to Prime why the ads??? 2) the device doesn't ever seem to turn off or go to sleep, unless done manually which involves navigating through menus :( Still five stars though, miles better than the Andorid tv box I was using previously.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: all that said I am very pleased with this version of the fire tv box and ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item because I wanted the reliability of an Ethernet connection plus sd card expansion for apps , I was going to buy the newer version until I found out it did not have these options. I previously had a fire tv stick which wasn't very reliable, but this fire tv box is lightning fast compared to that...all that said I am very pleased with this version of the fire tv box and would recommend buying it to anyone...excellent!!! P.S. Unfortunately this fire tv box is no longer available on amazon so I had to purchase from another site.
customer_reviews.author: philip key

customer_reviews.title: is excellent. I have used it constantly for a few ...
customer_reviews.text: After two broken fire sticks I finally took the plunge, no more constant buffering. No more false reports that my internet connection is slow when it isn't, no more freezing after a few hours. No more fatal crashes. This, is excellent. I have used it constantly for a few months now without a single problem. I would recommend it above the firs stick everytime.
customer_reviews.author: wild duck

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my Apple TV purely because I have both Netflix and Amazon Prime and Apple don't have an Amazon TV app so I had to buy something which catered for both which this does. It also has the added bonus of being 4K compatible. The only thing missing if I was to be picky is Apple AirPlay! If I could change one thing however, it would be the remote, not that it doesn't work perfectly well, I just happen to have an 'All in One' remote which doesn't work with Bluetooth so I am unable to use it to control the Fire TV.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Fire TV good, handheld remote rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Worked reasonably well for first 6 months but the remote frequently needed resetting. After 6 months the remote totally seized, just received a new one (at extra cost) and its works straight out of the box ... original still a brick. Fire unit itself and video definitely happy with it but the remote ... junk.
customer_reviews.author: Jailer

customer_reviews.title: Nearly there!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very effective device. Better than Chromecast as it can the same stuff as Chromecast as well as the faster phone free access provided by dedicated installed applications. Extra things I would have to have seen available out of the box without sideloading apps...1. TVCatchup. 2. Webcam support (for Skype). 3. Amazon certified keyboard and mouse. 4. Web browser. A device is only as good as its service offering!
customer_reviews.author: Mr L.

product_meta.title: Fire TV | Streaming Media Player (Previous Generation–2nd)
feature_bullets: Amazon Fire TV, now 4K Ultra HD compatible. Enjoy movies and TV episodes in stunning 4K Ultra HD with your compatible 4K UHD TV. See compatibility details below.
No 4K UHD TV? No problem. Amazon Fire TV lets you stream thousands of titles in high definition, up to 1080p.
Tens of thousands of TV episodes and movies, from Amazon Video, Netflix, BBC iPlayer, ITV and more, plus games, music and apps.
Now 75% more processing power, a dedicated graphics engine, better Wi-Fi support and 2GB of memory.
Say it. Watch it. Simply speak into your voice remote to find TV shows, movies and games.
No more buffering - ASAP learns what Amazon movies and TV episodes you like and buffers them for playback so they start right away.
Great for gaming with a quad-core processor and dedicated Imagination GX6250 graphics engine. Add to the fun with optional game controllers.
Amazon Prime members get unlimited access to Prime Video, including original programming such as Transparent, plus two million songs with Prime Music.
